comments.content:
It’s definitely not Arial Bold; is there a extra bold / black face?  
Could it possibly be Helvetica?

It’s definitely _not_ [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20051231042123/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.108076.0.13&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=NEWSLETTER+ABO&sampleSize=12), look at the shape of the leg of the _R_. It’s most probably [Arial Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20051231042123/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.649.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=16&sampleText=NEWSLETTER+ABO&sampleSize=12), as [Arial Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20051231042123/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.187.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=NEWSLETTER+ABO&sampleSize=12) looks too heavy.
